Class Attacking

java.lang.Object
domain.Character
domain.Plant
domain.Attacking
Direct Known Subclasses:
Evolve, Peashooter
public abstract class Attacking extends Plant
Represents an abstract class for attacking plants in a game. This class extends the Plant class and introduces an attack power attribute.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Attacking(int hitPoints, int cost, int attackPower, double time)
    Constructs an Attacking object with specified hit points, cost, attack power, and time.

  • Constructor Details

    • Attacking

      public Attacking(int hitPoints, int cost, int attackPower, double time)
      Constructs an Attacking object with specified hit points, cost, attack power, and time.
      Parameters:
      hitPoints - the hit points of the attacking plant.
      cost - the cost of deploying the attacking plant.
      attackPower - the attack power of the attacking plant.
      time - the time associated with the attacking action.
